title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
The NFL is officially back TONIGHT and Colin believes we will see a repeat Super Bowl champion for the first time in about 2 decades. He explains why things broke down between the Seahawks and Russell Wilson and why Seattle made a huge mistake. He also points out when he thinks Kyle Shanahan will move on from QB Trey Lance in this upcoming season. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to break down what our expectations should be for Trevor Lawrence this season. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
